summary: General accounting procedures with expertise in Accounts Payables, Costing, Billing & Accounts Receivables, Cash Management, Bank Reconciliation, Payroll Management, finalisation of accounts up to Balance Sheet, and MIS reporting. Proficient with ERP and accounting software (I-Travel Financials, MYOB, Tally, QuickBooks, Xpert, Leap) and MS Office. Strong data-entry accuracy, organizational and analytical skills, and ability to learn quickly.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Handled high volume payments (internal and external); reviewed supplier invoices for accuracy and reconciled statements; maintained accounts payable; monitored aging; processed payments by cheque, telegraphic transfers, and online transfers; ensured timely payments; oversaw daily cash and petty cash; prepared month-end reconciliations (bank, accrual, prepaid); ensured confidentiality and security of financial files; provided additional accounting/finance support as required.

experience.title: Accountant - Payables / Accounting Clerk
experience.company: City A boutique law firm (Corporate, Property and Construction)
experience.description: Accounts Payables: reviewed invoices for accuracy and policy compliance; processed aging and payment reports; maintained accounts payable listing. Cash Receipts & Petty Cash: managed cash receipts and deposits; petty cash reconciliation. Bank Reconciliation: daily monitoring to avoid irregularities. Vouchers & Data Entry: prepared vouchers in MYOB. Month end closing and Financial Reports: maintained Fixed Assets master; depreciation; closing entries; MIS reports (BRS, CFS, Ageing, Commission). Finalisation of Accounts and Annual Audit: prepared B/S and P&L schedules for audit. Secretarial: provided secretarial/admin support to Finance Manager.

experience.title: Junior Accountant
experience.description: Invoicing: prepared and issued invoices; recorded in Leap Accounting Software. Accounts Receivables: monitored receivables; improved speed of collections; cash application; follow-ups; negotiations with past due accounts; resolved client queries; participated in weekly credit control meetings. Accounts Payables: verified invoices; reconciled statements; processing payments per policy; arranged advance payments. Statutory Payments: arranged funds in advance for statutory payments. Payroll: updated employee records and processed payroll. Petty Cash: daily cash expenses and reconciliation. Accounting Vouchers: prepared vouchers; Leap entries. Financial Reports: assisted in monthly financial reporting. Secretarial: provided secretarial duties as needed.

experience.title: Accountant cum Secretary
experience.description: Bookkeeping: daily accounting in Tally; maintained General Ledger, Trial Balance, P&L A/c and Balance Sheet. Purchasing and clearance of shipments: prepared purchase orders; coordinated clearance; payments via cheques, bank transfer, documentary collection, L/C. Costing: calculated costs for pricing. Sales: supported sales team; ensured deliveries. Invoicing: timely invoicing and sales analysis. Cash Management: managed cash and petty cash. Letter of Credit: assisted with L/Cs; bank reconciliation. Finalisation of Accounts & Annual Audit: monthly and annual reports; liaised with auditors. Administration: secretarial support; liaised with banks, insurance, creditors and customers.
